org.lantern.cookie
Interface SetCookieObserver

All Known Subinterfaces:
CookieTracker
All Known Implementing Classes:
InMemoryCookieTracker
public interface SetCookieObserver

Interface for receiving notification of downstream Set-Cookie headers.

Method Summary
 void setCookies(Collection<org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.http.Cookie> cookies, org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpRequest context)
          Called when Set-Cookie headers are received.
 

Method Detail

setCookies

void setCookies(Collection<org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.http.Cookie> cookies,
                org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpRequest context)
Called when Set-Cookie headers are received. Note: these are raw results which may contain illegal Set-Cookie header values.

Parameters:
cookies - the parsed Set-Cookie header values
request - the HttpRequest in response to which the Set-Cookie header was sent.
